meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stubborn or unyielding.
meanings.sent1: Her obdurateness in refusing to compromise led to a stalemate in negotiations.
meanings.sent2: His obdurateness in sticking to his decision made it difficult to change his mind.
meanings.sent3: Despite his obdurateness, his friends found his determination endearing.
meanings.sent4: The obdurateness of the old tree roots symbolized the strength of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The obdurateness of the lock made it impossible to open without the right key.

meanings.definition: The act of being obstinate or inflexible.
meanings.sent1: The obdurateness of her refusal to consider other options frustrated her team.
meanings.sent2: His obdurateness in following the rules to the letter caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The obdurateness of the cat in refusing to eat anything but tuna was amusing to the family.
meanings.sent4: The obdurateness of the storm clouds signaled a long day of rain ahead.
meanings.sent5: The obdurateness of the traffic jam made it impossible to reach the destination on time.
